column3:
I thought double spaces between sentences were part of Satoshi's original vision :)

With that said: if we are to deviate from Satoshi's original vision with regards to spacing I suggest doing this change exhaustively:

```
$ git grep -E 'LogPrintf*\(.*?".*?\.  [a-zA-Z].*?"'
src/init.cpp:        LogPrintf("Block pruning enabled.  Use RPC call pruneblockchain(height) to manually prune b

Hey @practicalswift :).

Thank you so much for welcoming me. I, of course, don't want to deviate from Satoshi's original vision! 

Once again thanks for telling me as well as welcoming me!
They were actually both added by @mrbandrews in #7871, so I assume it was intentional.\n\nI think this is mostly a matter of taste.
